text: Youn Yuh-jung (; born June 19, 1947) is a South Korean actress. She has starred in many well-known South Korean television series and movies. She became well known internationally for her role as Soon-ja in Minari (2020). She won a Screen Actors Guild Award, BAFTA Award and an Academy Award. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Best Supporting Actress Academy Award winners Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean television actors
title: Youn Yuh-jung
